ygData.subject: Re: Umm... Hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmmm dying in pain skill, well, its not a pleasant thing, see, for every time you die, your stupidity skill goes up 5 points. then when you reach 1000 in that
ygData.messageBody:
hmmmm dying in pain skill, well, its not a pleasant thing, see, for every
time you die, your stupidity skill goes up 5 points. then when you reach
1000 in that skill, everytime you die, you get a dying in pain skill point.
what that means, is that for each death, you loose a random item, so you can
feel your characters pain. the item could be in the bank, or on your person,
or even money. its totally random, just dont let your stupidity skill get
that high, and you'll be fine :)


----- Original Message -----
From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 8:53 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Umm... Hello?


> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
> Let me answer this, let me answer this!!!!
> the dying in pain skill can be started only after you reach 1000 in the
> stupidity skill.
>
